text: Jeanna Vladimirovna Friske (; 8 July 1974 â€“ 15 June 2015), better known by the stage name Zhanna Friske, was a Russian actress, singer, model, and socialite. Firske died in Balashikha, Russia from glioblastoma, a rare form of brain cancer, aged 40. == Discography == === As Blestyashchie member === * 1997: Tam, tol'ko tam (Remixes) ("There, Only there (Remixes)" - 1st Remix album) * 1998: Prosto mechty ("Only dreams") * 2000: O ljubvi... ("About love...") * 2000: Belym snegom ("White snow" - 1st Compilation album) * 2002: Za chetyre morya ("Beyond four seas") * 2003: Apel'sinoviy ray ("Orange paradise") === As soloist === * Zhanna (2005) == Filmography == Year Title Role Notes 2004 Night Watch Alisa Donnikova Debut as actress 2006 Day Watch Alisa Donnikova 2010 What Men Talk About Herself 2010 Novogodnie svaty Herself 2010 Who am I?
